query:
UPDATE island_guides SET 
  topThingsToDo = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Relax on the Bikini Beaches', 'description', 'North and South beaches with soft white sand, calm lagoon, wooden swings, and sea turtles'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Snorkel With Sea Turtles', 'description', 'Spot green and hawksbill turtles near the drop-off daily'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Take a Fruit Farm Tour', 'description', 'Visit watermelon fields, papaya orchards, and taste fresh tropical fruits'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Sunset Beach Walks', 'description', 'Experience dramatic orange, gold, and pink skies at sunset'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Island Cycling', 'description', 'Free bicycles provided by guesthouses, explore through palm tunnels and farmland')
  ),
  attractions = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'North Bikini Beach', 'description', 'Most photogenic beach with wooden swings, sea turtles, and sunbeds'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'South Bikini Beach', 'description', 'Quieter beach with palm tree shade and peaceful atmosphere'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Fruit Farms', 'description', 'Watermelon fields, papaya orchards, chili and cucumber patches'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'House Reef', 'description', 'Great snorkeling directly from guesthouses')
  ),
  foodCafes = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Fresh Fruit Stands', 'description', 'Juice bars and fruit vendors throughout the island'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Local Restaurants', 'description', 'Seafood rice and Maldivian specialties'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Guesthouse Restaurants', 'description', 'Local and international cuisine options')
  ),
  threeDayItinerary = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 1, 'activities', 'Arrive by speedboat, settle into guesthouse, relax on North Bikini Beach, sunset walk'),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 2, 'activities', 'Fruit farm tour in morning, snorkeling with turtles in afternoon, café hopping in evening'),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 3, 'activities', 'Island cycling exploration, dolphin watching cruise, depart')
  ),
  fiveDayItinerary = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 1, 'activities', 'Arrive, settle in, North Bikini Beach, sunset walk'),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 2, 'activities', 'Fruit farm tour, snorkeling with turtles, local restaurant dinner'),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 3, 'activities', 'Scuba diving or snorkeling excursion to nearby reefs, manta ray spotting'),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 4, 'activities', 'Island cycling, night fishing experience, cultural experiences with locals'),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 5, 'activities', 'Sandbank excursion with picnic, final beach time, depart')
  ),
  faq = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('question', 'Is Thoddoo safe?', 'answer', 'Yes, Thoddoo is very safe. It is a clean, organized local island with friendly residents and low crime rates.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('question', 'What is the best time to visit Thoddoo?', 'answer', 'Year-round is good. Dry season (March-April, September-October) offers best weather.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('question', 'How much does accommodation cost?', 'answer', 'Budget guesthouses range from $35-50/night, with boutique options up to $100+/night.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('question', 'Can I see sea turtles?', 'answer', 'Yes, green and hawksbill turtles are abundant near the drop-off, especially at North Bikini Beach.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('question', 'Is snorkeling good here?', 'answer', 'Excellent! You can snorkel directly from the beaches and see turtles, rays, and colorful fish daily.')
  ),
  bestTimeToVisit = 'Year-round (dry season: March-April, September-October)',
  currency = 'MVR',
  language = 'Dhivehi'
WHERE LOWER(name) = 'thoddoo'
